Posts.Content: wrecko wrote: Hi,I am new and had DCIS high grade and my sister-in-law had a mammogram last week and it wasn't digital,so she is going tommorrow for a digital mammogram and possible ultrasound.They said she had tissue composite.Do you know what this means?I assume it is a change in some of her tissue.Any help would be appreciated as she is going crazy worrying.Thank you Log in to post a reply
